snippet.textDisplay: 7 Colossi disliked this.
snippet.textOriginal: 7 Colossi disliked this.

snippet.textDisplay: Isn't it odd that Quadratus ended up becoming the "mascot" for this game? You'd think the first Colossus you face (Valus) or the last one you face (Malus) would get that role. Quad's not even a fan-favorite, such as Avion or Phalanx. Weird.
snippet.textOriginal: Isn't it odd that Quadratus ended up becoming the "mascot" for this game? You'd think the first Colossus you face (Valus) or the last one you face (Malus) would get that role. Quad's not even a fan-favorite, such as Avion or Phalanx. Weird.

snippet.textDisplay:
I'm seriously considering buying a PS2 just for this game.

I mean, it's not like the PS2's library is small, but this game is one of those "one of a kind" experiences that I want to have for myself.

snippet.textDisplay:
I love this track, but everytime I hear it, all I can think of, is this-
*Stab*
Colossus- MMMRUUUUUHHHH!
*Stab*
Colossus- MMMRUUUUUHHHH!
It's like the sound effects have melded together with the music in my mind.
